content:
Currently while searching for this site on Google search doesn't help much as this is not so Google SEO friendly.
So my aim is to improve the Google ranking of chat.zulip.org so that it comes on the top while searching for the zulip
on Google.

I have started working on the front-end to improve this thing. Please guide me if I am on the right track.
Happy Coding :)
Hi @Sarthak R -- hmm. I'm wondering whether this is the right approach. When someone who's never run into Zulip before searches for Zulip, we probably want them to find www.zulip.org .

Can you talk a little more about where chat.zulip.org currently ranks when one does a search, and why you think chat.zulip.org should be higher than www.zulip.org? Or perhaps you think that www.zulip.org should more prominently point to chat.zulip.org?

Yes www.zulip.org is more prominent than chat.zulip.org.
www.zulip.org comes first while searching for zulip but while searching for "zulip chat" or "chat zulip" or "chat zulip org", chat.zulip.org never shows up in google search. Don't you feel like we should make it SEO friendly ? If so I can contribute.
www.zulip.org should be more prominent
Because that is useful for everyone using Zulip, not just this development community
